DOC.brief_title: Photosensitivity Skin Under Azathioprin Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.detailed_description: Photosensitivity skin UVA UVB renal transplant recipient without azathioprine determine . Azathioprine discontinue photosensitivity determine wash-out period three month - Trial medicinal product
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Renal transplant recipient azathioprin Exclusion criterion : Treatment Prograf ( Tacrolimus )
